mapper.select: select u.username,u.realname,ifnull(t.mcount,0) as mcount,ifnull(v.tcount,0) as tcount from (select rear.reviewer_id_num as username,count(rear.reviewer_id_num) as tcount from reviewer_expense_account_relation rear group by reviewer_id_num) v left join user u on u.username = v.username left join (select rear.reviewer_id_num as username,count(rear.reviewer_id_num) as mcount from reviewer_expense_account_relation rear where rear.is_cancel=1 group by reviewer_id_num) t on u.username =t.username
